context: The Finnish verb 'näyttää' is versatile and can mean several related concepts depending on context. As a transitive verb, it means 'to show' or 'to display' something to someone (e.g., näytän sinulle kuvan - I'll show you the picture). As an intransitive verb or with certain adjectives, it describes how someone or something appears or looks (e.g., hän näyttää onnelliselta - he/she looks happy). It can also refer to visibility or what is visible from a viewpoint.
